00026 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GenericFileWriterTest );
00027 
00028 void GenericFileWriterTest::setUp()
00029 {
00030     hdr = new FileHeader();
00031     hdr->SetFilename("generic_file_writer");
00032     GenericDataHeader gHdr;
00033     hdr->SetGenericDataHdr(gHdr);
00034     writer = new GenericFileWriter(hdr);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void GenericFileWriterTest::tearDown()
00038 {
00039     delete writer;
00040     delete hdr;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void GenericFileWriterTest::testCreation()
00044 {
00045     FileHeader* fHdr = new FileHeader();
00046     fHdr->SetFilename("generic_file_writer");
00047     GenericFileWriter w(fHdr);
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00049     delete fHdr;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void GenericFileWriterTest::WriteTest()
00053 {
00054         writer->WriteHeader();
00055     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00056 }
